result.eng: As far as I know, this is true.
result.ga: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.orig: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.html: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.
result.ponchtml: A ḟad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.

result.html: Fíor nó bréagachTrue or false?
result.ponchtml: Fíor nó bréagaċTrue or false?

result.html: Is fíor an ráiteas sinThat statement is true.
result.ponchtml: Is fíor an ráiteas sinThat statement is true.

result.html: Is fíor duitYou are right.
result.ponchtml: Is fíor duitYou are right.

result.eng: That's right but they won't believe us.
result.ga: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.orig: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.html: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.
result.ponchtml: Is fíor sin aċ ní ċreidfiḋ siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.

result.html: Tá an ráiteas sin fíorThat statement is true.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ráiteas sin fíorThat statement is true.

result.eng: The theory is wrong, according to the experts.
result.ga: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaithe
result.orig: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaithe
result.html: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaitheThe theory is wrong, according to the experts.
result.ponchtml: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaiṫeThe theory is wrong, according to the experts.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
